description: End-to-end purchase management workflow to control and track procurement lifecycle from requisition to payment closure. The system captures request details, approvals, sourcing, purchase order issuance, receipt, invoice processing, and payment, with planned vs actual milestone dates and delay calculations at each stage.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register

columns.name: Overall Status
columns.description: Current overall workflow status (e.g., Open, On Hold, Cancelled, Closed)

columns.name: Current Stage
columns.description: Current stage name for quick filtering

columns.name: Owner Procurement User ID
columns.description: Primary procurement owner responsible for the case

columns.name: Overall Planned Close Date
columns.description: Target date to close the purchase case

columns.name: Overall Actual Close Date
columns.description: Actual date the case was closed

columns.name: Overall Delay Days
columns.description: Overall delay in days = IF(AND(Overall Planned Close Date, Overall Actual Close Date), Overall Actual Close Date - Overall Planned Close Date, "")

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Stage 1 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned1, Actual1), Actual1 - Planned1, "")

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which goods/services are required

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total = Quantity * Estimated Unit Price

columns.name: Attachments Link PR
columns.description: Link to PR attachments (specs, approvals, etc.)

columns.name: Delay2
columns.description: Stage 2 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned2, Actual2), Actual2 - Planned2, "")

columns.name: Delay3
columns.description: Stage 3 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned3, Actual3), Actual3 - Planned3, "")

columns.name: Attachments Link RFQQuotes
columns.description: Link to RFQ and quotation attachments

columns.name: Delay4
columns.description: Stage 4 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned4, Actual4), Actual4 - Planned4, "")

columns.name: Delay5
columns.description: Stage 5 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned5, Actual5), Actual5 - Planned5, "")

columns.name: PO Total Amount
columns.description: Total PO amount including taxes/charges as applicable

columns.name: Delay6
columns.description: Stage 6 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned6, Actual6), Actual6 - Planned6, "")

columns.name: PO Released To EmailContact
columns.description: Vendor contact details used for release

columns.name: Delay7
columns.description: Stage 7 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned7, Actual7), Actual7 - Planned7, "")

columns.name: Expected Delivery Date
columns.description: Expected delivery date based on tracking

columns.name: Partial Delivery Details
columns.description: Details of partial deliveries if any

columns.name: Delay8
columns.description: Stage 8 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned8, Actual8), Actual8 - Planned8, "")

columns.name: Delay9
columns.description: Stage 9 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned9, Actual9), Actual9 - Planned9, "")

columns.name: Delay10
columns.description: Stage 10 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned10, Actual10), Actual10 - Planned10, "")

columns.name: Payment Due Date
columns.description: Due date as per payment terms

columns.name: Delay11
columns.description: Stage 11 delay (days) = IF(AND(Planned11, Actual11), Actual11 - Planned11, "")

columns.name: Last Updated By
columns.description: User ID who last updated the record

stages.stage_description: Requestor raises a purchase requisition with item/service details, quantity, budget/cost center, and required-by date.
PR is reviewed and approved/rejected based on authority matrix, budget availability, and compliance.
Procurement issues RFQ and collects quotations from vendors; records quote details and validity.
Commercial and technical evaluation, negotiation, and final vendor selection with documented rationale.
PO is drafted with final commercial terms, delivery schedule, tax, and payment terms.
PO is approved per delegation of authority and released/emailed to vendor.
Track vendor fulfillment, shipment, and expected delivery; manage delays and escalations.

stages.stage_name: Goods Receipt Note GRN  Service Acceptance
stages.stage_description: Confirm receipt of goods/services, quality checks, and acceptance; record GRN/service entry.
Capture vendor invoice and perform 3-way match (PO, GRN, Invoice) including tax validation.
Approve payment and execute transfer; record payment reference and settlement details.
Close the purchase case after settlement; capture supplier performance and lessons learned.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the complete purchase lifecycle with sequential stages, planned/actual dates, and delay calculations.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Reference master for vendors/suppliers used across sourcing, PO, and payment stages.

sheets.name: ItemService Master
sheets.description: Reference master for items and services that can be requested and purchased.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: Reference list of departments for PR ownership and reporting.

sheets.name: Cost Center Master
sheets.description: Reference list of cost centers for budget allocation and accounting.

sheets.name: Project Master
sheets.description: Reference list of projects for project-based procurement tracking.

sheets.name: UOM Master
sheets.description: Units of measure reference for item quantities.

sheets.name: Tax Master
sheets.description: Tax codes and rates used for PO and invoice validation.

sheets.name: Payment Terms Master
sheets.description: Standard payment terms for vendors and POs.

sheets.name: Approval Matrix
sheets.description: Approval rules by document type, amount thresholds, department/cost center, and approver roles.

sheets.name: Status  Dropdowns
sheets.description: Centralized dropdown values for consistent data entry across the workflow.

sheets.name: Import Dump - Purchase Transactions
sheets.description: Optional dump/import sheet for bulk upload from ERP/email extracts; data is validated before posting into the main register.
